headline: Here’s Why Skyworks Solutions (SWKS) Slid in Q1
summary: The London Company, an investment management company, released “The London Company Mid Cap Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. After two years of robust earnings, US equities entered a correction territory in Q1. The portfolio declined 4.3% (-4.5%, net) during the quarter compared to a 3.4% decrease for […]
